item.title: Learning Wildlife Photography with the Panasonic Lumix G9 Micro Four Thirds Camera
item.description: In July last year, my wife and I travelled to Japan on our three week honeymoon. Prior to the holiday I considered purchasing a mirrorless camera so that I could take better photos than my Samsung S23 smartphone could capture. Ultimately, I decided against the purchase as I wanted to pack lightly due to the number of different destinations we’d be moving between. I still managed to take some fantastic photos of Japan, but the thought of a proper camera didn’t escape my mind and I ended up purchasing a mirrorless body and a couple of lenses in October.
